People always talk about following their dream. They make their dreams and desires the centre of their lives. Ensure that the dream you’re following doesn’t take you away from the Almighty. Don’t ever do it at the expense of His Will.

If you have a good heart, thank the Almighty.  Don't ever regret it. You may be let down by people and you’ll be disappointed but no matter what happens, you’ll end up the winner. He knows and sees everything.
There are those who, no matter what you say or do, will never admit that they’re wrong. They’ll make it seem like it’s all your fault. Recognize this quality in people and keep away from them.
Nothing in your life happens randomly. The Almighty knows what He is doing to help you return to Him in the best way possible. You have to trust His Plan. He has planned it right to the last detail!

All that you’re going through won’t matter one day. That one day ..when everything stops and all that matters is how you lived your life. So don’t wait till you’re older to do good and be kind and to get closer to the Almighty. Don’t procrastinate. Do it now.

If the Almighty has chosen to guide you, be thankful. Remember, He guides whom He wills and it’s His Mercy that has enveloped you. Thank Him. Don’t look down on those who have deviated from His path. He can change their situation any time!

Almighty. On this blessed Friday, make us better people today than we were yesterday. Help us win the fight between desire and discipline so we may get closer to you. Help us let go of toxic, negative people from our lives so we may grow into positive and grateful people.

Always start your day with prayer. It will set you on the right course and really helps you cope better with unexpected things that may occur. And don’t forget to end it with prayer too, for no one knows if you’ll wake to another day.

Learn to view your hardships differently. See every adversity, every disappointment in a new light. They’re not meant to defeat you but to draw you closer to the Almighty. They’re there to make you a better person.

Don't make your fiends more important than your family. Some people are so good to those outside their homes but treat their family members badly; with abusive talk and action. If that’s the case, you’ve lost credibility with the Almighty!

The truth is there are people who will hate you if you’re doing well and they’ll hate you if you’re not. So whatever it is, don’t pay attention to them. You’re not alone in dealing with such people. Remember, insecure people put others down to raise themselves.

Be wary of the company you keep. They could be the cause of your unhappiness. If they’re overly focused on appearance, trappings of this world & social media, you could slowly be drawing yourself away from what should be the centre of your life, the Almighty.
Amidst the hardship & difficulties, you can still be a beacon of hope for someone. Never doubt that. Extend a helping hand, a smile, a meal for the hungry... you can be their miracle!

Each and everyone of us matters to the Almighty. He knows all there is to know about us; the good, the bad; the ugly. He created us. He cares about us. He loves us more than we could ever imagine. The whole world may be against us but He is for us.

When you stain your tongue with slander, backbiting and gossip, your spirituality goes down significantly. You may think you’re harming the other person but in actual fact, you’re harming yourself. So learn to hold your tongue because it has the power of life and death!

Our attitude towards time shows our attitude towards the value of life. Remember, time is a gift from the Almighty. What we do with time is what we do with our lives. Every moment that passes by is an opportunity gone, used or abused, never to return.

The Almighty is the Owner of Everything. He never runs out of favour. His Resources are limitless. The fact that He blesses someone abundantly won’t stop Him from doing the same for others.

As much as the Almighty opens doors for us, He also closes them. When that happens, it takes a mature mind to say, "I don't understand it, but I'm not going to get upset because He knows what’s good for me. I shall accept it. I trust Him fully.”

When you believe and trust that the Almighty has your back no matter what you’re going through, that’s faith! That’s when life becomes more peaceful & less stressful because you know He will get you through the good times and bad times in life.

Almighty. On this blessed Friday, we ask You to protect and guide us every step of the way. Keep our hearts firmly attached to You, no matter what we’re going through.  Elevate our status in Paradise so we may be in the company of the righteous.

In the course of our lives, some things are not going to make sense, but that’s okay. Rest easy knowing that the Almighty wouldn’t have allowed it if He wasn’t going to bring good out of it. Don’t doubt that. He always has our best interest at heart.

No matter how bad your day is going, you have no excuse to treat others badly. Check yourself now because it’s wrong and needs to stop. Don’t be the cause of someone else’s suffering and misery. Be the better person and always treat others the way you’d like to be treated.

When you’re still aware that you’ve sinned & conscious of your shortcomings, know that it’s a blessing from the Almighty. He’s watching, waiting for you to turn back to Him. Strive to get back on track. Don’t procrastinate. Start now.

Forgiveness is not only about others. It’s also about our own spiritual growth. Love and forgiveness cannot be separated. If we choose to live the way the Almighty wants us to, then forgiving is an option that cannot be avoided. Because we all sin, we should forgive others.

Let us be honest with ourselves. We all do foolish things from time to time. We do things we know we shouldn’t but nothing we do is beyond the Almighty’s everlasting Mercy. Remember, we may make mistakes, but He doesn’t.

Don't let anger control you. Don't let hate breed in your heart. Don't let negativity be the order of your day. Keep your heart guided in the right direction. Keep the Almighty at the centre of your life and you'll live a life of passion and purpose.

Don't belittle the one who remains silent. Not only can it be more powerful than words, it also takes a lot of maturity, effort and intelligence to keep quiet when you’re expected to respond in the same way you were spoken to. It’s a powerful tool to learn and master.

When you finally see your reward in Paradise for all the pain you endured in the temporary world, you’d wish you had more of the pain at that time! No one knows what awaits us for what we used to do but the Almighty. So keep going.

Remember, the Almighty’s Mercy and Forgiveness surpass anything you can imagine. So don’t think of giving up each time you fall back into sin. Instead, think of why you should start over and try again. You’ll get there!

As the year draws to an end and the holiday season is upon us, let us be mindful of others, be extra careful on the roads, courteous and patient while travelling and most of all, seize the opportunity to spend some quality time with loved ones. Happy Holidays!

Our lives can end in a heartbeat. The Almighty can take us anytime. It has nothing to do with age. Young or old, when it’s your time, you’ll go. Be prepared. Don’t be caught up in this world with never-ending desires.

No matter what you’re going through in life, learn to put your trust in the Almighty. Confess to Him, confide in Him, cry to Him, plead with Him. Bit by bit your life will change. This world will matter less to you. You’ll get closer to Him.

Loss is never easy. Loss of a loved one, loss of wealth, loss of a job. All these can break your heart. But don’t let it make you lose hope in the Mercy of the Almighty. Your heart will heal; it will soften. You’ll draw closer to Him. You’ll feel whole again.

Never forget that the Almighty is on our side. If we take a single step towards Him, He takes many “steps” towards us! Yes, life is hard & unfortunate things happen to us. Often we don’t know why they happen. But trust Him & know that He wants good for us.

If the Almighty has first place in your life, you won't have to worry about who has the other places. Everything will fall into place and your heart will be content. That’s all that matters eventually.

When you want to correct others, you have to find a way to emotionally reach them. Sometimes when you give advice, people become more aggressive & even worse off than they were before you gave them advice, just because of the way you did it. Use the kindest words & be sincere!
Never say you have nothing to give. You always have something to give. It may not look like much to you, but to the Almighty, it is far better than a gift from among the wealthiest around you!

The Almighty may test you to see if you’re really true to your word or do you just pay lip service. Do your actions speak as loud as your words? Practise what you preach and He will raise you in status.

Be wary of arrogance. Only the humble can get close to the Almighty and realise that they’re nothing without Him. The minute arrogance takes  root in your heart, a barrier forms. A barrier between you & your Creator. Humble yourself for Him and He will raise you.

Many of us are guilty of overthinking. Remember, the battle starts in your mind. Don’t defeat yourself in your own mind before you’ve even started. Focus your mind in the right direction. Be positive about things. You will see the difference.

Don't panic, don’t be frustrated, don’t worry. You’re exactly where the Almighty wants you to be at this point in time. Whatever you’ve experienced so far is all part of His Divine Plan. It will shape and mould you into the person you’re meant to be.

Be humble always. Don’t let arrogance creep into your heart. Respect people around you. Each day, try to make an impact on people who cross your path. Try to be a source of inspiration to others. Nobody knows what tomorrow will bring.

When you find it hardest to forgive the one who has wronged you, that’s when you should really try to do so. It could be the most loved act by the Almighty that will take you to Paradise on the Day of Judgement!

Satan never tires of all the whispering, plotting and planning against us. As long as we have the slightest doubt, he is succeeding. That’s why we should never stop remembering the Almighty  to protect us from all of Satan's evils.

Be strong. Stay firm in faith. Face whatever the Almighty has decreed head on. Seek His Help & Protection always. Don’t worry about what others say. When you come to the end of your life, you’re not going to answer to people, you’re going to answer to Him Alone!

Nothing is guaranteed in this life, except death. So don’t delay asking for forgiveness. Each night, before you go to bed, clear your slate with the Almighty. You’ll never know if you will live to see the next day.

No matter what’s happening in your life right now, no matter how bleak things look, anything is possible as long as you seek the Almighty with a sincere heart. He will make things happen which your limited mind could never comprehend. He will respond & that is His Promise.

Don't wish ill on others. It can come back to you in the most unimaginable way. Always want good for people & you’ll end up being blessed. Cultivate a good heart. Purify your thoughts. Remember, the Almighty loves those who do good.
Making a false statement doesn't change the reality. No matter what people say, the truth will prevail. The Almighty has a purpose for your pain, a reason for your struggle. Pray hard. Don’t give up!

Almighty. On this blessed Friday, we pray for those in need. Those with broken hearts and broken lives. Bless them with healing. Change their circumstances. Help them make sense of all the chaos going on round them.
May the Almighty protect those in occupied lands, grant them ease amidst interference from foreign influence and keep them safe. Ultimately, it’s the Almighty who will solve all our problems.

When we ask the Almighty for something, we should do so with trust and certainty that He will answer it. Never should we supplicate with a lazy mind & distracted heart. Ask wholeheartedly.  Keep asking. Be patient and don’t give up.

The root of all diseases of the heart is our love and attachment to this materialistic world. We know this world is temporary, yet we find it so hard to disengage from it. May the Almighty guide our hearts into desiring what is lasting - the Hereafter.

We often trust the worldly things around us, our wealth, a hefty pay check, a lifestyle of excess. We forget that all this can be swept away in the blink of an eye, leaving us with nothing. But if we trust the Almighty,  He will see us through the toughest of times!

Society will always pressure you into being this or that. We are brainwashed daily into believing it. Each one has his or her opinion. That’s okay. Deep down in your heart, you know who you are. Don’t let people pressure you into becoming something you’re not.

When you want to give advice, do so in such a way that people want to listen to you. Don’t be mean and hurtful. Be genuine in wanting to correct their ways and help them get back on track. Your sincerity will long be remembered.
Stay away from empty chatter and useless talk. There’s no need to show off or put others down when you’re in conversation.

The more successful you are, the more humble you should be. Don’t try to show your greatness because greatness belongs to the Almighty Alone. Recognise this. Submit to Him and show humility. You’ll earn closeness to Him and His special Mercy!

When making decisions, be guided by what is permissible and your heart will be at ease. Don't feel bad about making decisions that may upset some people. You're answerable to your Creator not His Creation!

Always remind yourself of your purpose in life. Never leave the Almighty out of the equation. And think of death often too. It will humble you and soften your heart. And reminds you not to be sad about worldly matters. Remember this life is temporary. It will come to an end!

Whatever it is that you want, ask the Almighty. Your whole life can change with supplication. That’s the most powerful tool you have. Use it. Don’t waste it. It can change your fate. Only He can give you what you want. And you’ll be rewarded just for asking!

When you speak ill of others behind their backs, you’re backbiting. Be wary. What they are and who they are, shouldn’t be matters of concern to you.  Just stay away from this bad habit and you’re working your way towards Paradise!

The Almighty Alone knows the pain, sadness and emptiness felt on the loss of a loved one. This is why He has taken it upon Himself to reward such patience. Nobody else would understand but Him. Bear patience.

Some judge others because it gives them a sense of prestige; demeaning others can also create a false sense of security. Remember,  people are all different. No two persons are completely alike. Accept these differences & stop judging others. It’s a hurtful & sinful act.
It's human nature to get frustrated at times. When that happens, the best thing to do is to take a step back from whatever situation you’re in, confide in the Almighty and give Him complete control!

When you submit fully to the Almighty, don’t be surprised if He tests you with tough times and challenges. These are the things that bring you closer to Him. Show Him sincerely that you’re worthy of His Paradise!

Being happy for others will not rob you of your own happiness. When someone has more than you, it doesn’t mean they’re getting your share of the blessing. What’s yours will be yours. The Almighty will see to that. Always wish the best for others!

Almighty. On this blessed day, remove worldliness from our hearts & envy of what others have. Help us to be grateful & not to attach our hearts to more material things. Protect us from the tricks of Satan, who will keep luring us to the pleasures & desires of this world.

No matter how you look at it, when you speak ill of others, you’ll be on the losing end. All that time spent in sinful conversation could be converted into good deeds, if the same amount of time was used in remembering the Almighty.

What you show of yourself, in front of others for the world to see, should be no different from the way you live your life away from the public glare. If you have a different set of rules behind closed doors, then you have a problem that needs to be addressed.

Learn to mange your time wisely & get closer to the Almighty. When you get up in the middle of the night while everyone is sleeping, you’re telling the Almighty that He matters. Remember,  ultimately we will all return to Him so spend your time wisely to build your Hereafter.

Talking about others is not always gossip, but when the talk turns negative, that’s when you have to be careful. Look for ways to bring it back on track, back to being positive. And be sure you’re not belittling others.

Let people backbite and spread rumours about you. There’s not much you can do anyway. But thank the Almighty because they’re giving away their good deeds to you. Be at ease knowing you’ll be rewarded for it.

If you think you can make yourself great by making someone else look small, think again. Don’t ever belittle anyone. Remember, if you can’t help them, at least don’t hurt them or make them feel worthless. Give those you meet their due respect.

When people are quiet, don’t label them as snobbish or arrogant. They could be hiding their pain and prefer not to talk about it. There’s a story behind every person, a reason why they are the way they are. That’s why it’s so important to be kind.

The sad truth about many today is that they want to be someone else. With social media, nobody is happy with who they are. They compare themselves to false images, mostly photoshopped. It’s time to stop pretending. You’re NOT the person you claim to be online!

Truthfulness is a rare commodity these days. So many people don’t want the truth. They’re happy in their comfort zone. They’re willing to tolerate all kinds of lies and wouldn’t do anything to change it. Remember, we will be answerable to the Almighty when the time comes!

Don't be the negative mind that takes to social media when it is bored; spreading hate, doubt, speculation, falsehood, disunity and negativity. Instead, be the positive mind that spreads goodness, no matter what the circumstances; even in the face of negativity.

Being able to forgive the one who wronged you and being ready to trust him again are two different things. Don’t let others manipulate you to feeling guilty because you’re not ready to trust again. Seek guidance from the Almighty. He’s All-Knowing.

Don't waste your time worrying, especially about things beyond your control. Don’t let worry take away your joy. Instead, use that same energy to thank the Almighty for all that you have. Thank Him for being in control.

Don't be overly dependent on others. People will disappoint you again and again. Start relying on the Almighty. See how He brings people who can enrich you into your life. Trust His Plan and see how your life changes.

No matter what’s happening to you, there’s always hope. You’ve got to believe that. Choose hope over despair. Remember nothing lasts. So cling on to the hope that things will change for the better. And that change will come soon.

Breaking a promise is a serious sin. It's a sin that sows the seed of hypocrisy in the heart of the one who commits it. Some are in the habit of doing this often. Don’t take it lightly. They’ll be raised with the hypocrites on the Day of Judgment!

There'll be hardship & struggle just like there’s happiness & ease. It’s the nature of this life. Don’t let the difficult times consume you. Try to focus on the good things in life. It helps you to appreciate what you have. Above all, protect your heart & your soul!
Almighty. Our heartfelt prayers for the victims, their families as well as all involved in the earthquake. May You comfort them and grant them ease in this difficult times. #iranEarthquake

Always ask the Almighty to soften our hearts. May we have compassion for those who suffer in unimaginable ways. Learn to pray passionately for them as we do for ourselves & our loved ones. And above all, may our souls remain humble.

Hopelessness is a great sin. It’s often the result of ignorance of the greatness of the Almighty. One should never give in to despair. Even in the worst case scenario, there’s a glimmer of hope in the heart. Remember His infinite Mercy; He will never turn anyone away.

As humans, we tend to compare. Don’t think of others who seem to  have a better life. The trouble is we see perfect images everywhere today. We wonder why we don’t have the same. Don’t fall into that trap. Thank the Almighty for all that you’ve been blessed with.

Avoid gossip at all costs. It’s a rumour & fabrication of the truth; a despicable act that can totally bring a person down. If you’re the target of rumours, don’t retaliate. Stay calm. The person who started the rumour will eventually hurt his own reputation in the process.

At times, the Almighty puts you through hard times because He knows when you’re at your lowest, you’re most likely to turn to Him for comfort, knowing He’s the only One who can change your condition. Be patient with whatever He has decreed. Be grateful when things get better.
Many of you have been asking me if I am on instagram. Yes I am. The handle is muftimenkofficial. A very interesting peep into many personal aspects of my life. Please share with others.

The truth is we all need encouragement & motivation. Everybody needs somebody to cheer them on, someone who sees the best in you. There are too many people putting others down in this world. Be a positive influence in someone’s life.

As humans, we will definitely disagree with each other on some matters, at times strongly. That does not make either of us bad or evil. We must learn to respect our differences. Each one of us has the same right to his or her own opinion.

Don’t feel like you have to fit in & do what everyone else is doing; what society dictates of you. Stop letting others decide for you. At the end of the day, it’s your journey & yours alone. Walk it with humility.

There will always be someone who’s taller, richer, better-looking with a better job and so on. We can either allow ourselves to fall into the dangerous trap of comparison, or we can choose to remember that regardless of that, we all have our own struggles. That’s life. Live it!
Almighty. On this blessed Friday, forgive our faults & ignorance. Things which we have done knowingly & unknowingly. You’re All Knowing, You know better. Keep guiding us each time we falter!

Life's about sacrifice. It’s about making choices. You can’t have it all. But when you know you’re doing it for the sake of your Creator, it becomes more meaningful. Surely His rewards are the best rewards!

How Merciful is the Almighty! When you commit a sin, it’s recorded as one sin. If you intend to do a good deed but end up not doing it, it’s still recorded as one good deed. When you actually do it, it’s recorded as ten!

When someone disagrees with us or somehow makes our life difficult, remember that it’s often not about us. It may be about their pain or struggle or whatever they’re going through. Give them the benefit of the doubt.
It takes a lot of effort to avoid being sucked in by other people’s negativity at times. Keep your focus on the positives and don’t let people mess with your mind. Stay alert and vigilant!
Whatever you can give & whenever you can, spend in a good cause. You’ll be among the richest & happiest person on Judgement Day!
Don’t expect to develop your character in times of ease. That happens only in trials & times of difficulty when your soul is strengthened
Don’t give in to worry. It will rob you of everything, leaving you drained & lifeless. So no matter what happens, keep your inner peace.
Death can come anytime. It doesn’t matter if you’re healthy or wealthy, you’ll have to go when it’s time. You can’t challenge or avoid it!
Facial expressions affect the mood of those around you. Make an effort to be positive. It will change many lives, begining with yours.
If you feel like you’ve reached the end of the road & want to give up, think of the hundreds of times you’ve failed & yet His Mercy remains
Beware those who just love conflicts. They know how to get you to respond with the right triggers. Know their tricks. Don’t engage them.
Your journey is yours alone. Not everyone will understand it or like it. It’s ok. Use the pain of the past for the strength you need today.
When you give, you will receive. The Almighty will see to that. Ask yourself, what are you giving? It will come back to you some day.
Be wary of those who lie to make themselves feel good. They discredit others out of jealousy; a disease that’ll lead to their own downfall.
Learn to trust that the Almighty will work out every little detail of your life eventually. So don’t worry. Keep your heart at peace. ❤️
Even when disagreeing with someone, choose good words. There’s no need to be rude & hurtful because you don’t share their point of view.
Your deeds are weighed according to how sincere you are. Don’t waste your good work & effort by putting every bit of it on social media.
People who try to destroy your happiness are simply jealous of you. Pray for them because the truth is they’re unhappy with their own lives

Don’t let any storm set you back. It should propel you forward & toughen you. That’s what a believer does. Stay firm in faith at all times.
If you want to relieve stress, focus on what you’re doing & leave the haters to do their thing. Positive energy goes a long way!
No matter what obstacles are placed in front of you, keep going. The greater the challenges, the greater the reward. Let the Almighty guide!
Pray for those who criticise you unfairly, judge you wrongly & say hurtful things. Don't do the same to them. Respond with kindness instead.
Keep doing good. Don't lose your values because of the misdeeds of others. Inspire as many as you can to do the same. It will change lives.
Beware the company of those who sit & gossip with no concern for truth or lies. The ones who insult & ridicule others. Fear such company!

When you experience pain, cherish it instead of grieving about it. It’s the Almighty’s way of showing His presence in our lives.
You will stand. You will fall. You will rise again. Such are the challenges in life. Nothing lasts in this world. Forever is in Hereafter!
Learn to live within your means & to give without worrying. The Almighty will provide if your intent is good. Prepare for the life to come!
If things are good right now, be thankful but know that it won’t last. Similarly, if it’s dark & gloomy, that too will pass. That’s life!
Before we criticise and label others, take a minute to understand their pain & turmoil. How would you react under the same conditions?
Think of death often, the moment you’re alone in your grave with only your deeds. It would be too late to wish if only you had done more.
Crime doesn’t pay. Not only is it a sin, you’ll never be at peace. Whatever bad you inflict on others will come back to you some day!
When you call out to the Almighty, call out sincerely & with confidence that your call will be answered. Above all, be patient & trust Him.
When others let you down & don’t meet your expectations, don’t be upset. Pray for them. As humans, we’re not perfect. Only the Almighty is!
When we feel weak or overwhelmed, seek refuge in the Almighty. Nothing’s too much for Him. He’s in control. He’ll always see us through.
Almighty. On this blessed day, may we not hate those who’ve wronged us. May we forgive them & leave the rest to You. You’re the Most Just.
Don’t expect things to go your way. They won’t. If He delays what you’ve asked for, it’s one of the biggest tests of your faith & patience.
It’s hard to be grateful & thank the Almighty when you’re going through a struggle. But give thanks as He strengthens you even more.
No matter how much the heart aches & the soul feels like it has been torn apart, if you have faith in Him, you’ll survive. Nothing lasts.
We may think it’s a rejection. In fact, it’s the Almighty’s protection. Our limited minds can’t understand this. Some day it’ll make sense.
Always believe that the Almighty wants the best for you. Never leave Him out of the equation. He will direct your steps & guide you.
Never tire of telling the Almighty your problems. He cares, He listens, He understands & He doesn’t give up on you; unlike some people.
Everyone wants an increase in wealth. We forget that only good deeds will stay with us, leaving behind our riches & loved ones.
Almighty. You know everything about us, our weakness, our needs. We seek help from only You. Help us bear beautiful patience when tested.
Wherever you go, treat people with kindness. But don’t expect gratitude or anything in return. Let the reward be from the Almighty.
If you're blessed with wealth, use it wisely. You'll be envied but do all the good you can. The Almighty’s given you a huge responsibility.
Never mind if you don’t understand it. Never mind if it doesn’t make sense. It may be painful. But He knows what He’s doing.Just trust Him.
Don’t let anger into your heart. You may think it means you’re more superior than someone by showing your power. In truth, it will kill you
There’s a reason the Almighty  sends some lessons your way. You’re meant to learn the lesson, not repeat the mistake & pass it on to others
The Almighty’s not concerned with your skin colour, financial status or anything else, except your sincere efforts to get closer to Him.
Always be kind and respectful to others. Remember, the way you treat them will come back to you some day. What goes around comes around.
Almighty. On this blessed day we ask You to make our last day the best part of our lives. And may the best day be the day we meet You.
When you’re facing what you think is the worst test, go & look for someone who’s having a more difficult time. It’ll make you more grateful
Everything that happens in this life is test. Just live your life passing the test. Should you fail, that’s not the end. Get up & move on.
Trials come to every person, with no exception. You may not like them but the Almighty uses them to push us to higher levels of faith.
Don’t let Satan outsmart you. He’ll tempt you with small sins,  day in, day out. He will keep at it till it destroys your faith. Take heed.
When you’re being oppressed or victimised, take heart. You’re never alone. The enemy won’t win. The Almighty always has the final word!
Your hardship won’t last. Your sadness won’t last. Nothing lasts in this world. Every test you go through will empower you. You’ll be ok!
When the Almighty tests you, He’s testing how well you’re able to restore faith in your heart. Be patient. Don’t lose faith. Ease will come

Your hardship won’t last. Your sadness won’t last. Nothing lasts in this world. Every test you go through will empower you. You’ll be ok!
Whatever’s going on in your life right now, never take for granted what the Almighty has done. Remember, all things happen for a reason.
Be wary of those who will try to get you involved in petty battles which don’t matter. Stay clear of them, their drama & their agenda.
No matter how knowledgeable you are, always remain humble. Check your heart & intent often. Remember, Satan wasn’t stupid, he was arrogant.

No matter what you’re facing, when it’s time for you to shine, when it’s time for you to excel, you will. None can stop what He wills.
Don’t let your frustrations make you miserable. There’s more to life than that. Control your attitude. It goes to show how mature you are.
When you treat others with respect, extend a helping hand & spread goodness, you’re actually embodying what a true believer is. Keep going!

Almighty. When we start losing hope or begin to doubt ourselves, remind us that Your Plans are always better than we could ever imagine!
Almighty. On this blessed day, hide our faults & forgive our sins. Save us from disgrace in this world & the next. Accept our good deeds.
Words that come out of your mouth should never be swear words. Control the tongue & work on your manners. Say no to rudeness & arrogance!
Don’t behave as you please in front of your children. They’re  more likely to follow your example than your advice. Show them the best way!
Even in your lowest moments when you’re totally helpless, don’t despair. The Almighty will send something your way when you least expect it
Greed isn’t always about money. It could be about your talent, your happiness, just who you are. The less you show off, the better for you!
Never mind what others think of you. Honestly, it’s not your business. Make it your business to be a better person each day. Work at it!
When you feel nothing seems to go your way; you’re facing one trial after another that’s when you need to cling on to hope! He’ll lift you!
Don’t let this life defeat you. We all have worries & burdens but we don’t let ourselves crumble because we believe He’s watching over us!
Guard yourself against being overly stressed. Stop expecting things to happen right now. Believe that things will happen in His timing!
When you know you’ve hurt someone, be quick to make amends. They can cry & complain to the Almighty because of the pain you’ve caused them!

Learn to stay calm when you’re tested. Exercise restraint & logic. Don’t let what others say control your reaction. Remember, nothing lasts
In the end, justice will prevail, no matter what. If not in this world, in the Hereafter. That’s why we have Judgment Day. Have faith!
We do get tired at times. But quitting is not an option. Keep going. Keep your focus. The Almighty knows the best time for everything.
Don’t keep replaying the bad that has happened. Learn from every experience. Change your thoughts to positive ones. It’ll change your life.
No matter what thoughts Satan’s feeding your mind, the Almighty has NOT abandoned you. He’s helping you in ways you’ll never comprehend.
People will always talk, no matter what you do. Keep doing what’s right. Have faith; the Almighty knows what’s going on behind the scenes.
Almighty. On this blessed day grant us relief when we’re distressed. Have compassion on us & hear our prayers. Keep our faith & hope alive!
Be wary of the heart that has become hard. Keep repenting. Move closer to the Almighty. Cry out of fear for the sins you have committed.
If you put your hope in situations or people, you’re likely to be let down. Put your hope in the Almighty. He won’t leave you disappointed.
We love perfection. But we’ll never achieve that in this world for it belongs only to the Almighty. So stop expecting people to be perfect!
Don’t be too concerned about who’s right. What is right is more important. Argue less, guard your tongue. Keep the peace. You’ll be blessed
Never lose hope. It’s what keeps us going. Start praying again. Start expecting again. The Almighty knows what’s going on in our lives.
Whatever you’re focusing on in this life, remember the greater life is the Hereafter. May the Almighty grant us the loftiest place there!
Don’t compete with the one you see on social media. That’s most likely NOT real life. Just be yourself. Never mind if it’s not glamorous.
To fail doesn't make you a failure. It teaches & reminds you that the Almighty’s plan always prevails. He’ll send you signs & redirect you!
Showing gratitude to the One who created you is a very powerful thing. It gives you a sense of balance & draws good into your life!
Whatever position you have in life, be humble. Don’t compare yourself to others. It’s the Almighty who raises you, not people around you!
Don’t go back to your past involving toxic people & those with bad intent towards you. Focus on getting better & attracting better people.
Some days, you'll be angry. Some days, you'll be sad. That’s how life goes. Don’t let your feelings get the better of you. Keep your focus.
Satan always wants you to feel depressed & defeated. Quit feeling that way. Pick yourself up. Turn to the Almighty & walk in His Path.
You may feel you’ve been suffering for a long time but if you’re firm in faith, the Almighty will show you a way when you don’t see one.
This world’s a testing place. Things won’t go according to your plan. What He wills, happens. If heaven was on earth, we won’t be tested!
Almighty. I bring my burden to you because I can’t make it on my own. Give me strength, comfort me, heal my heart & help me carry on.
Almighty. On this blessed day, may we never be the cause of pain for anyone. May we always be a source of light & goodness wherever we go.
Protect your heart at all costs. Don’t let negative, nasty people in. Everything comes from your heart. If you lose it, you lose everything.
For every trial that comes your way, the Almighty has given you strength to face it. He would never give something you couldn’t handle.
The day we enter Paradise is the day we have succeeded. None of the pain would be remembered. Pray that He grants it to us by His Mercy.
The Almighty sees our tears & hears our prayers always. Pray that He strengthens us so we can face the trials with utmost patience.
If someone says or does something that upsets you, don’t take it to heart. It’s not easy but it’s for your own peace of mind. Just forgive.
The Almighty knows what He’s doing. Don’t ever doubt that. He has your best interest at heart. It’s part of His plan. Trust Him fully.
Hold on tight to your prayers. Don’t let go because they repel the evils of this world. When done properly, they’re a source of peace!
You go through pain for a reason; from feeling lost to being found, from despair to faith, from falling to getting up again. It’s His plan.
It’s normal for us to feel unappreciated & unrewarded if we’re doing things for the wrong reasons. Do it for His sake & He will reward you!
No matter how much you’ve sinned, don’t let the guilt take you away from remembering the Almighty. Ask Him sincerely for forgiveness.
Shift your focus from doing the impossible to make life perfect.  Concentrate on what’s within you; be content on the inside; be positive.
Let’s face it, we will never be able to write down every single blessing the Almighty has given us. Start being grateful. Thank Him daily.
Don’t fret if the world still doesn’t know you despite the good you’ve done! The Almighty knows & the angels are mentioning you in Paradise
On this blessed day, Almighty, protect us from tragedy & evil of this world. Grant us strength & patience to face whatever You send our way
When your heart’s not in the right place & you feel uncomfortable about something, it’s often wise not to pursue it & to leave it alone.
When things around you don't seem to make sense, perhaps the best thing to do is to say nothing.. just pray. The Almighty's in full control

When something bad has passed, learn to thank Him & move on. Don't keep replaying it in your mind. Start healing & move on.
Learn from past experience & mistakes.The Almighty sent them for a reason. If the same situation happens again, draw on the lessons learnt.
In life, there'll always be those who want to drag you down. Don't let them. Keep your head up. Focus. The Almighty is All-Knowing.
Learn to be at peace with yourself for not being perfect. Don't hide behind a mask. Empty your heart out & tell Him your fears & doubts.
When your heart's heavy and your mind's anxious, turn to the Almighty's limitless Mercy. No matter what you're facing, He's there for you.
The Almighty knows you're tired, fed up, close to breaking point. But He's given strength within you even when you feel weak. Keep going.
Bit by bit we're being trained by social media to compare our lives instead of appreciating what we have. Be wary before it destroys us.
Worry is part of life. It's natural for us as humans to have such thoughts. What's important is not to let them get the better of us.

When we intentionally harm or accuse the innocent, we're actually cursing ourselves. It"ll return some day to haunt us in a bad way. Beware.
Don't give up when it's hard. Don't give up when life's not fair. Keep going despite the odds. The Almighty will bring you through it.
Just because something happens to shake your faith doesn't mean it should break your faith. The Almighty is watching you. Keep going.
Appreciate the little acts of kindness; feel the love & appreciate all things around you. Learn to swallow & ignore things that hurt you.

Be strong & have good courage. Nothing is too much for Him. The Almighty has already armed you with strength for every battle!
Endure the tough times. That's when we gain something. We may not like it but we gain experience & endurance. It develops our character.
The higher you climb in life, the more people will criticize you. Even at your best, people will still find a bone to pick. Ignore them.
Feel the mountain of worries crumble & your heart at ease when you supplicate to the Almighty. Such is the power of prayer. Trust Him.
Don't let your pain make you unkind. Nobody knows what the other person is going through. There's too much suffering in the world already.

Keep doing the right thing despite the trouble, difficulty & betrayal. One day, the Almighty will connect the dots & it'll all make sense.

Get rid of your attachment to material things. Give what you don't need to charity. You'll find your life calmer & your mind clearer.

Life won't come to a standstill just because you have an issue with someone. Don't let it affect your heart. Be tolerant. Live & let live.
At times, you know you're right. In fact it may even be quite obvious that you are, but for the sake of peace, you just learn to let it go!
May the Almighty protect us from evil doers who go out of their way to cause harm & hurt. May He grant peace & security in troubling times.
Be content with what you have & you'll be happy. Be patient with the little; grateful for the big. Accept His Decisions. They're the best!
Don't rely on others to make you happy. Be positive. The Almighty is by your side. Take care of your mind set. He will make you confident.
When times are tough, that's when your character is developed. When you face trials & suffering, your soul is strengthened. So keep going.
When your failure brings you closer to your Creator, that's NOT failure. That is your success. Thank the Almighty for it.
It's the ending that's important. Not the flaws in the beginning. Strive to improve what's left of your life. He'll forgive what has passed
Beware those who are always unhappy & will go out of their way to make others feel bad. These negative people will use you & tire you out!
Don't stay down when you're knocked down. Get back up again. The Almighty didn't bring you this far to leave you there all by yourself!
Pray for a heart of ease, calm & hope. Pray that the Almighty protects it from being cold & bitter. Pray that He keeps it firm in faith.
Don't look down on others with arrogance. Try to help as much as you can. Be tolerant with people. The Almighty will open doors for you.
We're in a sad state. We let society dictate the norms.We're victims of our own desires, happy to please the world. What about our Creator?
No matter what happens in life, keep a good heart. A heart of patience & trust. Don't let the darkness of this world harden your heart.
You think things look like they're getting worse. But they're actually getting better. The Almighty's checking on you & will pave the way!
Be wary of Satan. He wants us to be ashamed of our faith. He wants people to ridicule us. Hang on tight. Pray for our hearts to stay firm.
Almighty, our sins are countless but Your Mercy is limitless. Forgive us. Do not shame us on the Day that matters most. We need Your Shade!
There's a reason why He sent others away & left you alone. Tell Him your regrets, worries, fears & hopes. He's listening & ready to respond
Most of us get defensive when we're criticized. Don't. Listen instead. Take in the message. Assess the situation & what you need to do!
It is sad that the only way some will talk about you is when they hear of bad news about you. Let them spread what they will. He knows!
We work so hard to make everyone else happy with us, yet, some people will still find it not good enough. Please the Almighty instead.
Your heart may have been stabbed by hurtful words from careless people. You're in pain. Comfort & soothe yourself with the Almighty's words
The problem is we notice mistakes in others so quickly that we overlook the good in them. Forgive others if we expect Him to forgive us!
Learn from your past but leave it there. Don't keep going back. It will destroy your future. Live for what the Almighty has given you today
While you're busy giving others advice, remember at times you need to listen to & follow your own advice as well. This is the way to grow!
At times, our greatest enemy is the frustration we feel with the Almighty's timing. We forget He creates obstacles to test our patience.
Don't be too focused on somebody else's life on social media that you try to be like them. You'll be jealous & bitter. Live your own life!
When you feel completely broken, the only thing that can heal you is connecting with the Almighty in prayer. Only He has the power to heal.
Never wish pain on others. They may have caused you pain but pray for them instead & wish them healing. The truth is they need that most!
Don't feel trapped by the situation you're in. Pain, loneliness, financial woes; turn to the Almighty. He has promised a way out. Trust Him
The trouble with us is we are so desperate to be understood, we get upset when people misunderstand us but we forget to be understanding!
No matter how wrong it was or who wasn’t there for you, don’t use it as an excuse to blame others. Be responsible for your own actions.
Don't hold grudges. Let them go & be merciful. Remember, the mercy you show others is the mercy the Almighty is going to show you.
Almighty, we ask You to renew our hearts with strength & purpose. Forgive our past sins & help us get closer to You. Guide us always!
Don't think marriage is what you see in pictures on Instagram. It's hard work, a lot of sacrifice as well as give & take.Prepare to commit!
Don't be sad when people plot & plan against you. The Almighty is in full control. Remember, His Will is above everyone's else's.
When you ask the Almighty, you don't need to apologise for repeating yourself. He knows your situation & loves those who are persistent!
Whatever problem you may have with others, being abusive & violent is not the solution. It doesn't solve anything. It only makes it worse.
Nothing lasts. Your sadness will pass, your youth will leave you. Your pain will vanish. So keep moving to reach our final destination!
How many of us miss out on today because we're worried about tomorrow? Today's a gift from the Almighty. You can never get it back!
Avoid people who bring you misery, disturb your peace & don't allow you to be yourself. Choose those who support, motivate & encourage you.
Sort matters out soonest when you've had a dispute with someone. You can't possibly have a restful sleep, knowing you've wronged someone.
You may have a head full of knowledge but if you've no compassion & not willing to lend a helping hand, you need to relook your values!
We worry about what will happen tomorrow, next month, next year.. it never ends. Focus on now, the present. Work to get closer to Him!
Blessed is the one whose heart is so broken but still has the courage to be gentle & kind to others. Cherish such people. Learn from them.
It's easy to be good to the one who's good to you. The real test is when you can be good to someone who’s done you wrong. That's maturity!
Don't let people drag you into their drama & petty quarrels. Excuse yourself & refuse to take part in it. Life is less stressful that way.
We often carry our broken hearts to people, reveal to them our problems, only to be hurt even more. Confide in the One who heals the hearts.
The longer you hold on to your anger, the more damage & harm it can do. Let go of such ill feelings & don't let them fester in your heart.
Almighty, on this blessed day, grant ease to the oppressed living with injustice, fear & terror. Stop the calamities & restore peace.
You'll feel empty for as long as you fill your heart with love of this world. Cultivate love for the Hereafter; it'll fill your heart!
The trouble with us is we let our hearts harden after we've been wronged. Keep your heart pure & soft, no matter what. He'll reward you!
Whatever you're going through, nobody will understand your true situation until it actually happens to them. So confide in the All-Knowing.
The truth is some may dislike you for no reason whatsoever. These are tests you have to endure. Don't retaliate. The Almighty's in control.
We worry so much about being accepted by people. We always want to fit in. Forget about what the world says. Gain His acceptance instead!
There's no life without trials & no success without patience. So the harder your test, the more hopeful you should be that His help is near
Don't despise or hurt others. You may seem powerful today but things can change in the blink of an eye. Reflect & stay humble. Thank Him.
Keep your heart pure. Let others do what they will. Keep doing good. Don't dim your light to become as dark as they are. Shine above them!
Love those who want good for you & sincerely correct you. Not he who wants to show up your fault. A believer is the mirror of his brother.
Let go of stress & worry. Hand it to the Almighty. There's no need for anxiety & panic attack. Supplicate. Ask Him. He'll get you out of it
With social media, some live a life that's not theirs. Things look perfect on the outside. Don't live to please others.Get back to reality!
When you feel let down by those closest to you, don't despair. The Almighty won't let you down. Get even closer to him in your low moments.
If you can't help others, don't hurt them. In the end, what counts is our character & the impact we had on others. Live a life that matters
If you're not happy with life, reflect & commit to change. If you're not worshipping Him as you should, don't wonder why peace escapes you!
Some people will always choose to misunderstand your intent & look for flaws. No matter what you do, you can't change them. Pray for them!
On this blessed Friday, Almighty, save us from diseases of the heart. Hypocrisy. Envy. Pride. Anger. Jealousy. Don't let our hearts harden.
We point a finger & correct others often but why is it so hard to correct ourselves? No one's perfect. Admit your faults & correct them.
If you're always filled with worry, stress & anxiety, you need to relook your life. You're supposed to trust the Almighty & His plans.
Whatever you're facing now, only the Almighty will understand it. Don't bother explaining to someone else. Be patient. It'll be worth it!
No matter what life throws at you, remain kind & compassionate. Never be angry & rude. It can be difficult but it will endear you to Him.
Be wary of arrogance. It makes you blind to your weakness. You feel you deserve everything ; never contented. It can lead to your downfall.
Cultivate patience. Being upset won't make you achieve your goals any quicker! Everything has its right time. Every delay has its blessing.
When you feel you can't get out of bed to face another day, ask the Almighty to lift you up. His Strength is all you need. Just ask Him!
You don't need to share every aspect of your life with others. Nobody will understand your path anyway. Let them see the finished product.
Don't expose your soul to rubbish & expect to have a smooth life. Music. Porn. Foul language. Be careful what you feed your inner self.
The most fortunate person isn't he who has worldly wealth but he who is quick to repent, seeks forgiveness & feels regret for all his sins.
People will blame you & say nasty things because you refused to be part of their conflict. Let it be. Don't let them disrupt your peace.
Good or bad, what you give, you'll get it back. Just leave it to the Almighty to deal with such things. He is All Knowing. He is fair.
Value your friends who bring you closer to the Almighty. Learn to let go of relationships that create a distance between you and Him.
Speak the truth & mean what you say. Your word is your honour. Too many people make empty promises which they never intend to fulfil!
Despite the obstacles you face daily, know that you're never alone. You may feel that you are but the Almighty is always watching over you!
Learn to ignore & disregard the noise around you. Keep your heart at peace. Build self control & discipline if you want to get close to Him
Don't be selfish & think only about yourself.  Be sensitive to the needs of others. If you want them to respect your time, respect theirs!
Almighty. On this blessed Friday, we ask You to hide our faults, forgive our sins & not to embarrass us in this world & the  Hereafter.
Make a promise to the Almighty you want to do better than what you did yesterday. He will forgive you for that which has already passed.
Don't try to please everyone. That's a definite recipe for disaster. Be true to yourself instead. The sincere ones will appreciate you.
Never rush your acts of worship, knowing it could be your last opportunity to do so. Always put Him above all else. May He have Mercy on us
No matter what you're facing, know that someone else has it worse. Be patient with the problems you have & grateful for what you don't have
Whatever trials you're facing in life, never give up on patience & prayer. They're two of the best antidotes. Be steadfast. He's watching!
The Almighty has blessed us with more than we've asked for. Why choose to despair over the few things you may not have been granted yet?
I am saddened by the death of one of the greatest scholars of Hadith, Shaykh Yunus Jaunpuri RA today. May Allah Almighty grant him Paradise.
Never underestimate any act of kindness, no matter how small it is. It's better to be the one who smiled than the one who didn't smile back
We may have reasons to disagree but that in itself is no reason to hate. Our resentment is more a reflection of ourselves than others.
Don't sleep each night thinking that tomorrow's promised. Nothing's promised in this life except death. Stop for a moment. Think about this
Not everyone will value you. But there are a few who will stand by you no matter what. They're the ones praying for you without you knowing
No matter how bad you're treated, let it go. Wake up ready to take on a new day, as each day is a test. Don't let your anger get in the way
Share whatever you have with someone who has less than you. Use His Blessings & try to cut back on some luxuries. He will grant you more!
You're messing up so much. Satan whispers you should give up because you're not worthy.Don't give in. Call out to the Almighty by His Mercy
Take your problems to the Almighty not to others. Your worry, fear, anxiety, weaknesses; pour out to Him in humility. Wait for the results.
On this blessed day, let us not waste Your  precious gifts of health & time. May we spread goodness now, while we're still able to.
Don't waste time trying to prove your critics wrong. They'll never be satisfied & will always find something to pick on. Run your own race.
If you want to repent, do it now. If you want to change, start now. Don't wait for the perfect moment.Don't waste the time He has given us!
Some will go out of their way to disturb your peace. Don't allow their petty drama to stress you out. Don't take it to heart. Let it go.
Don't expect people to treat you as you treat them. The ones you love the most may be the ones who'll hurt you most. You can't control it!
You think you're coming to a dead end & things will never change. You don't see a way. Trust the Almighty. He has a way out for you.
Pay attention to those with special needs, both children & adults. Be more compassionate & patient. They'll inspire you in special ways.
Learn to stay away from arguments. They sap your energy & rob you of your inner peace. It takes a mature person to not get into an argument
Seek knowledge from the right people. Don't be ignorant or arrogant. Nobody knows it all except the Almighty. Learn to say "I don't know".
There's always something we want badly in life. Confide in the Almighty. Connect with Him when the world is asleep. Show Him your sincerity
Don't make life difficult for others. It will all come back to you in some way, some day. Create ease so He will do the same for you.
Be patient with yourself. Be kind to yourself. We've all been hurt & had mean things done to us. But we pick ourselves up & keep going.
In our lives, we fight too many battles that don’t matter. Remember, they are distractions. Don't waste time. It's not worth your while.
Beware the ones who are so full of themselves & see everyone else as deviants. Only they are right. Be careful of this sick mentality.
Life has a way of showing you the true colours of others. Don't beat yourself for not finding out earlier. It'll come to light in the end.
Almighty. On this blessed Friday, grant us strength to fulfill our duties unto you. Make it a means of our entry to Paradise by Your Mercy.
Worry is the biggest thief. It steals your time, energy & inner peace. Turn your worry into worship. Seek Him. You'll find your strength!
No matter how shattered your heart is, never lose hope. Cry to Him for as long as you need. Only He can turn tears of sadness into pure joy
Do you sometimes feel like everyone is letting you down? The Almighty puts such people in your life to teach you to depend only on Him.
Don't react to others when you're emotional as you're more likely to misinterpret what they say. It takes a calm, sensible mind to do this.
If you want something done well, do it yourself. Don't expect others to feel the same way about it. In most cases, you can't rely on people
Whether things work out or not, it's the Almighty's will. Keep going. Whatever the outcome, there's a blessing in it. Keep smiling.
Be wary of those who have a whole set of rules for others but follow none of their own rules. They pretend to be what they're not.
People will say & do things to upset you. That’s just the way it is. As long as you behave with integrity, you'll be at peace.
Being respectful, kind & polite are often mistaken for flirting. It's sad because such qualities are becoming uncommon in a stressed world.
Always remember we're better off than many in this world. Our struggles are small, yet we always complain. Thank Him upon all conditions!
Society will judge you by its own standard. Don't bother with it. The care you've shown, the love you've shared; they matter so much more.
As you celebrate Eid, do remember the less fortunate. Keep them in your happiness. May the Almighty grant us all peace & love for humanity
Whether you're celebrating #Eid Sunday or Monday, please have an awesome Eid filled with love, kindness, compassion, worship and joy! https://t.co/lSkFOykCEA
All the good we've done should not come to an end with the end of Ramadan. Hold on to them beyond this month & start a new beginning.
You may think it's impossible to get out of your situation. You're wrong. The Almighty can make things happen that we couldn’t make happen.
We all have ups and downs; days where we struggle more than others. Know that the Almighty is aware & will never let our efforts be wasted.
Almighty. On this last Friday in Ramadan, may You accept our fast, deeds & worship. Make us among those who'll see the next Ramadan. Aameen
Don't let our enthusiasm dampen as we approach the last days in Ramadan. Let us renew our intent & refresh our goals. Seek His Forgiveness.
If you've been blessed with wealth, thank the Almighty. But be sure to keep the wealth in your hand & not in your heart. Give to please Him
Take advantage of the last few nights & His Mercy. Even if you've slacked off, get back up & finish the month beautifully. Make it count!
Don't look back with regret on missed opportunities. He closed those doors for a reason. May He open doors that always lead us back to Him.
Don't bring yesterday's failures into today. Learn from them. Move on. The Almighty has better things in store. Put your full trust in HIM.
Don't look at material possessions & form your opinion of others. That's shallow. If you're worried about it, the problem lies with YOU!
If your Ramadan hasn't gone well, don't fret. Use these last few days to give your all. It's the end that matters. The rewards are waiting.
Don't stress too much over worldly matters. Worrying about the future or regretting the past is a waste of time. Leave it to the Almighty.
The more you give, the more you'll get back. Even if it's not money, give your time, words & advice. He will reward you in greater ways!
May the Almighty grant Paradise to victims of the senseless killings in Ramadan. May He comfort the families left behind & ease their grief.
The last days of Ramadan are the most significant. Now is the time to ask Him for all your needs. The Almighty doesn't tire so don't tire!
Some people just love pushing others down. Don't worry about them. They are powerless to stop what the Almighty has planned for you.
Be content with what the Almighty has given you. Be grateful for the big, be patient with the little. Ask Him for  blessings at all times.
Rearrange your busy life in these last blessed days. Pray like you've never done before. With humility, with heart, with soul. Focus on Him
Thank the Almighty for giving us the last blessed nights. May He grant us choicest blessings as we humble ourselves in prayer for His sake.
Don't look at your neighbour & lose hope in your situation. Whatever you want will come to you. Be patient. What's meant to be will be!
Be in the company of those who build you up & have good intent for you; not the ones who pretend they care but will gossip & backstab you.
Don't be sad if your Ramadan isn't going according to plan. Don't regret that you haven't done more. Try to make the most of what's left.
Work hard for your Hereafter. Keep a balance with worldly life. You don't need to shout about it. Let the lives you touched make the noise.
Almighty. Give us strength to face these most blessed nights. We ask You to accept all our prayers, fasting, charity & all our good deeds.
The Almighty does not consider you superior because of your rank or riches. He looks at your heart, level of piety & your closeness to Him.
Ramadan is like a reset button. He knows we're looking to get rid of bad habits & refresh. It's the best time to start on a clean slate.
Are you often suspicious & think ill of others even before verifying? It's a bad habit disliked by the Almighty. Stay away from negativity!
Don't fall into a slump in these last nights of the blessed month. You should be giving it your all. We are never promised the next Ramadan
Don't underestimate the evil-eye. It's real. As far as possible, keep your blessings hidden. Be humble. Make the Almighty your focus.
Calamity has its blessings. Embrace it. The Almighty knows. He has seen how it can transform a harsh person into one with the kindest heart
As we enter the last third of Ramadan, pace yourself for the most beautiful nights. May the Almighty keep us strong even when we feel weak.
Don't keep overlooking your small sins. It's dangerous to think that they don't add up. Like pebbles, they can soon turn into mountains.
Blaming others for your shortcoming doesn't help you move forward. You can either feel sorry for yourself or make a change for the better.
Each day brings new challenge. But with each challenge, let us try to be better; more patient, more conscious of our Maker. Ease will come!
Why do we make negative assumptions about others? Let us break the habit this #Ramadan . If ever we have to assume, make it a good one!
Don't waste acts of worship by engaging in gossip, slander & the likes. You'll end up a bankrupt having to pay off those you've wronged.

As we approach the halfway mark in Ramadhan, let us pray for those who've left us, those who are unwell & those facing great hardship.
The real test of your character is when circumstances don't go the way you want. Will you then remain a kind, caring & good-hearted person?
Protect yourself from needless harm. Stay lowkey & private when everyone else is overexposed. Pray to Him sincerely to guard your heart.
We walk around as if all is well because we're afraid others will judge if we show our pain. So be kind to others. Everyone has a story!
Angels gather around good company. Make sure to spend your limited time here with good people. Life's too short to live otherwise!
If you're not fasting because your friends are not fasting, you're in the wrong company. Surround yourself with those who make you better.
Think of all the useless activities we've engaged in this Ramadan, wasting His precious gift of time. Don't let the month slip by. Seek Him
Be careful of misquoting others, especially with the intention of hurting  them. Not only is it a huge sin, it will come back to haunt you!
You feel nothing is going right. You see delays & closed doors, If you fully trust what He has in store for you, you'll pick yourself up!
Give up jealousy once & for all. One day you're ahead; people are envious of you The next day you're down, no one bothers to look at you.
Each day in Ramadan, call out to Him to forgive & guide you. Make it sincere & heartfelt. Ask Him to NOT let you get back to your old ways!
In this blessed month, be wary of what goes out of your mouth. Stay away from lies, backbiting, speaking bad & harsh words. Be disciplined!
It's so common nowadays to boast & announce your achievements. Learn to be humble & dignified when you've done well.Let your actions speak!
No matter what hate & abuse people hurl at you, be kind. Don't go down to their level. Let the Almighty deal with them. He's All-Knowing.
When you fast, you're showing the highest form of patience. You readily accept His Decree. You stay away from things that are forbidden.
Protect your heart. Give up mindless chatter on social media & among friends. Spend time in good company. This life's short. Don't waste it
Almighty. Bestow peace & sanity across the globe at a time of confusion, bloodshed & loss of lives. Let us treat everyone with respect.
Never look at hardship that comes your way as something permanent. Remember, the Almighty can overturn anything. Besides, nothing lasts!
Every blessing He has bestowed comes & goes for a reason. If you thank Him & trust Him, your heart will always be at peace, no matter what!
In this blessed month, we pray for a heart filled with compassion. May we respond generously & wholeheartedly to those who are in need.
Almighty. On this blessed Friday, give us strength & patience to reach the end of #Ramadan in the best way. Make it a turning point for us.
This is the month of change. Don't make it the month of waste.  Each day, countless hearts are softened & turned to Him. Don't miss out!
The Almighty never expects us to be perfect in this blessed month. But He expects us to keep on trying. And He will reward us for it!
For surprise insta-live videos, insta-stories, photographs and more, follow me on instagram https://t.co/bfUwNgHqSP
Don't compare yourself with anyone. You may be struggling to get through the fast while some find it a breeze. He loves your sincere effort
Even if it's ONE bad habit, give it up this Ramadan. Do it for the sake of the Almighty. Let this month impact you like never before.
Don't worry about losing an argument, more so in Ramadan. You'll have a home in Paradise if you control yourself, even when you're right!
Don't feel you're doing more than others in Ramadan. They may be doing it privately while you're only pointing fingers & seeking attention.
Live each moment of Ramadan to the fullest. Our lives are short. This blessed month is even shorter. Connect with the Almighty in all ways!
Staying away from food isn't just what Ramadan's all about. Don't forget to control tempers & tongues, even more important now than ever!
#Ramadan is a month of forgiveness. If you let this month go without seeking & being granted His Forgiveness, you have truly missed out.
Having reached #Ramadan is a blessing in itself. Nobody's promised this month. So recognise its value. Pray, give charity, purify the heart
Plan your Ramadhan well. Don't jump into it & expect the spirituality to last the entire month & beyond. Small consistent acts are better!
It's never too late to make this your best #Ramadan. Start planning. Keep your intent pure. It's not about being perfect; just do your best
As we enter #Ramadhan if we're upset with anyone, let us forgive one another for His sake. Let us not keep a heart full of grudges.
Almighty. Let us greet the month of great blessing with a pure heart, fasting for only You. Help us control our desires & suppress greed.
Our lives have become so public without us even realising it. One click is all it takes to see the lifestyles of others; even strangers!
If you enjoy His blessing, you must also accept His trials. That's how it is. When you envy the blessings of others, remember their trials.
What we say about others speaks a lot about our own character. When we speak ill of people, we hurt them & damage our reputation as well.
Don't bring your yesterday into today. Each new day is a means for us to get closer to the  Almighty. Don't waste it. Not everyone gets it.
As long as you're alive, there'll be people who will speak ill of you. That's life. Just stay above it all. Don't do what others do!
Cut out bad talk, swear words & evil speech. Don't hurt people's feelings. Keep doing good & you'll feel a lot better as a person.
There's no room for hate & violence in this world. The after effects are more damaging. Spare a thought for humanity. All lives are sacred.
If you feel bad after you've sinned, take heart. There's hope. It shows the Almighty wants you to get up & get off on the right foot again.
Don't lose sleep over what others have been blessed with. The Almighty's the Owner of Sustenance. Be happy instead. He'll give you more.
Nobody knows what tomorrow will bring; will you have enough money, get married or have children? Trust Him completely. Live each day fully.
At times we feel life's unfair because we don't know what the Almighty knows. Don't hurt those who hurt you. Move past it. Let it be.
Do something nice for someone today. The first to benefit from this is you. You'll feel a sense of comfort & the great reward is from Him!
Social media can hurt young minds. Eating disorders, depression, addiction, poor self image when you start comparing!They're real! Be safe!
If you don't want to be chained to your past, learn to let go of the grudges you're holding. This life is way too short. Just live!
Amidst all the goings-on, learn to step away from the chaos of life. Reconnect your soul with your Creator. Your heart will find peace!
On this blessed day Almighty, help us purify our hearts from spiritual sins; greed, malice, envy, arrogance & hatred. Draw us close to You.
If you want something, ask the Amighty for it; a good job, a dutiful spouse? Raise your hands sincerely. Nothing is impossible for Him.
Learn to be happy with what you've been blessed with. If you think by getting more you'll be happier, you're fooling yourself. Be grateful.
You may not see a way out of your desperate situation but that doesn't mean the Almighty doesn't have a way. He knows the best time!
Learn to fend for yourself. Don't depend on others or wait for their help. You may end up waiting all your life. Ask only from your Creator
Some will wrong you & not bat an eyelid. It may bother you how they can be so heartless. But thank the Almighty. At least you have a heart!
Today, we're bothered about how our lives look to others. We try to paint the best picture. Stop! It's truly about how it feels to us!
Often we look for the good in people, only to be let down because good can be masked by fake clothing. Let's look for what's real instead.
We are quick to give up on others because of their shortcomings. Yet the Almighty is most merciful towards us each time we do wrong.
Bury your ego. Get it out of the way. Learn to be compassionate instead. Live from your heart. You'll end up a much happier person.
If a friend walks out on you because of your faith, don't despair. The Almighty will replace him with someone even better. Stay firm.
Yes, this life is tough. Our tired souls, exhausted minds & deep scars tend to make us forget what He has promised. Don't quit, press on!
Don't fool ourselves & think we have all the time in the world. We don't. Do good as much as possible. You never know when the time is up!
Humans are strange. When they can't understand you, they label. When you're quiet, you're proud. When shy, you're stuck-up. Let them judge!
Whatever happens, keep moving. The ups & downs, the love & hate, the good & bad. They come & they go. That's our journey. We'll get there!
Many are so careful with their health & wealth, going to great lengths to protect it. But sadly, they neglect the state of their hearts.
Almighty. On this blessed day, we ask You to grant the sick a complete recovery & to expiate their sins for every bit of suffering.
Speak less if you can. If nothing good is going to be said, be silent. If you see something bad, advise kindly. Not in an arrogant way!
Don't be a show off. Question your intention before doing a deed. Do good away from the public eye. The  rewards from Him are greater.
No matter how much material gains you make in this world, if your heart is not connected to the Almighty, your happiness is temporary.
If you keep looking back, living a life of regret, how can you expect to move forward & embrace all that the Almighty has in store for you?
Whatever you do, be gentle. People might have forgiven your harsh words but they may never forget how it stabbed their heart at that time!
Your self worth doesn't depend on what others say about you. You don't have to apologise for the way you look & your belief. Be yourself.
Many times things happen which you don't understand. You feel discouraged by the twists & turns in life. They're all a part of His plan.
At times, the pain you're going through seems so unbearable & you feel you can't go on. Don't get angry with yourself. Nothing is permanent
Your haters & critics don't control your life. They want to show that they have a hold on you, your emotions & reactions. Ignore them.
Just because the Almighty hasn't  given it to you yet, doesn't mean He won't or can't. He'll give it when you're ready. He knows best!
As much as you think you know someone mainly from what they post on social media, think again. All their unshared struggles we don't know!
Don't fret when you're tested. The Almighty knows what He's doing. Some of your greatest tests will turn out to be your greatest strengths.
If you don't like a person, stay away & don't hurt him. Don't be vulgar, abusive & disrespectful towards him. That's a sign of weak faith.
Almighty. On this blessed day, give us a heart that will obey You, no matter what happens, no matter what the circumstances may be. Aameen.
Don't wish ill on others as much as you want to hurt those who hurt you. Wish them healing. Wish them love. Walk away. The Almighty knows.
Don't expect others to have the same heart as you. You'll end up disappointed if you think they'll do for you as you would do for them.
Do you know someone with a good heart; who accepts apologies you don't give & sees the best in you? They're a rare breed. Treat them well.
A quiet person is not a weak person. He's strong in fact. He has struggles like all of us but he chooses not to stress others with it.
When you strive in the way of the Almighty, you don't worry about being accepted or having the approval of others. You know your priority.
Learn to forgive & let go of those who have wronged you so you'll be free to move ahead with a light heart. Let peace & happiness prevail.
There's beauty in pain. We connect better with the Almighty when we're in pain than when we're content. That's how He draws us closer.
Fame like many things can be good if used properly. But it can also destroy you because Satan is good at messing with your egos. Be wary.
At times we can't control how our heart feels. It can weigh us down like a heavy burden. Ask Him to ease the feeling. He will grant peace.
How strange life is. The rich aren't satisfied. The poor desire to get rich. Attach your heart to your Maker & none of this will matter.
It's normal to feel tired & worn out sometimes. All we need is a little bit of help to push us to higher ground. Seek Him for that strength
When times are tough, the easiest thing to do is to give up. But to cling on when everyone else expects you to let go, that's real strength
It's easy to lose someone by the lies you've spoken. No matter how much truth you speak after that, it may be difficult to get him back.
Almighty. On this blessed day, we ask you to forgive our parents & grant them the highest level of Paradise for all that they've done.
That moment we allow ourselves to depend on others, that's the moment we will find ourselves being disappointed. Depend on the Almighty.
If you ever feel tired of this world, remind yourself, it's all temporary. Nothing lasts here. Only Hereafter is forever. It awaits us.
Whatever happens in life, it's for the best. You may have lost your job or got a new one. Whichever it may be, show patience & gratitude.
Don't be intimidated by those who always pick on the faults of others. Truth be told, they're the ones with the most fault themselves!
Everyone of us has the same access to the Almighty, king or commoner. As long as we seek Him, He's there for us always!

Sh Ja'far RA passed away in Indonesia while reciting Surat Al Mulk.
