توفي الشيخ جعفر أثناء قرائته للقرءان الكريم.
For as long as we're alive, expect to be hurt, criticized & insulted. Stand firm & remain patient. Let the Almighty take care of things.
It's easy to impress people on social media because that is not real life. Learn to make an impact in real life, away from the glare.
There's nothing more dear to the Almighty than us asking Him to fulfil our needs. Don't hold back. Ask sincerely. He knows what's best!
Be charitable. It doesn't just mean giving money. Smile, remove whatever's troubling someone, speak good words. Your heart will be happy!
Don't attach yourself too closely to people & things. Nothing lasts. Not even our problems & worries. Think of Hereafter. You'll find peace
The problems we face in life are NOT stop signs. They're the Almighty's way of making us learn. So use them as guidelines to move forward.
Your strength doesn't come from winning. It comes from your struggles & hardship. That's why the more He loves you, the more He tests you!
Never give up on hope. One day it will all come together. You'll look back on all that you've been through & thank the Almighty for it.
Whatever you do today, resist the urge to gossip & speak negative words about people. Take your concerns to the Almighty & pray for them.
Instead of worrying about things, pray to the Almighty. Let Him know your concerns & troubles. He'll help you overcome the odds & heal you!
Almighty. On this blessed day, help us defeat our egos & not be offended by what people say. Let us let go of the need to be right always.
Stop pointing fingers at other people's mistakes. We all make them. It's easy to see faults. Try to have a patient heart that listens.
This life is too short to live being offended, angry, bitter & full of hatred. Each new day is a gift from the Almighty. Live it well.
With the social media explosion we are all facing daily, don't measure your worth by what you see. Each one is special. He made us that way
Always be alert & exercise self-control. Satan wil tempt us in every possible way. Make it difficult for him to get us to do what is wrong!
No matter how good a person you are, some will hate you. Don't despair. People often create their own drama out of jealousy. Ignore them!
Don't live a life of worry, frustration & disappointment. It saps your energy & steals your joy. You won't be able to see His blessings.
The Almighty has it all planned for you. Stop worrying about how  & when things will unfold. He will see to that. Your job is to trust Him.
When you see someone doing bad, don't insult him. Because he may turn over a new leaf tomorrow & be a better person than who you are today.
When someone criticises or disagrees with you, don't let the hatred from it stay in your heart. Get rid of the feeling. Don't let it grow.
People demand so much from you that even when you've given your best, it isn't good enough. As long as He knows, that's all that matters.
Making mistakes isn't the end of the road. There's life after that if we learn from it. Seek Him. He can change your life for the better.
Having a bad opinion of others is a disease of the heart. Give them the benefit of the doubt, be kind & show people that you're honourable.
What the world needs badly now is compassion. Try to be in someone else's shoes, someone who is facing severe hardship. Pray for them all.
When you feel this world is too much to bear, get away from it all; devote your time to the Almighty. Pour your heart out & feel the peace.
Never fear failure. It teaches us valuable lessons. It can change our lives. It lets us taste humility; the best time to get close to Him.
Almighty. Keep our loved ones safe in this dangerous world. Protect & grant them good health, peace of mind & contentment above all else!
Almighty. On this blessed day, we ask You to protect our parents. May we not make them low in our priority list after all that they've done
Some people just love to pick on you & your mistakes. They actually feel inferior to you. Stay calm. Know that they're the problem; not you
We've reached a stage where we post our problems for the world to see, but we don't speak about it to the one we're having problems with.
Things won't always go the way we want them to. We may need to let things go to build up new ones. It's painful. But it's part of His plan!
Don't spend your life wondering what could have been. The past is done. Don't dwell on it. We can't afford to lose what's to come. Move on.
Many people will cross your path in life. Don't lose track of your path because you're too busy judging others. Focus on yourself instead!
Don't live your life comparing yourself to others you think are better than you. Don't try to live up to them. He made each of us unique!
Be careful who you chat with on social media. Often the online personality is so different from the real personality. Don't be tricked!
Never tire of doing good; no matter how small the act. Remember, at times all someone needs is a hand to hold & a heart that understands!
Remember we don't deserve anything. Whatever we have is a favour of the Almighty. Don't let praises get to our head. Just praise Him.
We all want Paradise. Yet we complain when we are tested. Adopt a new attitude. Know that nothing good comes easy. Face trials patiently.
Almighty. Protect us from the evil whispers of Satan who tries to turn us away from doing good. We seek refuge in You, the All-Knowing.
When someone does or says something bad to you, don't take it personally. Don't dwell on their bad reaction. Be nice to them anyway.
When people react negatively to you, turn it into something positive. Don't stoop to their level. Appreciate all the goodness around you.
Never give up on your children. No matter how bad things are, don't say you've reached your give-up point. Keep praying. He knows & cares!
We keep asking for more. Before doing that, look at what we've been blessed with. Don't ask for more than we need. Learn to be grateful!
Many think silence is a weakness. It's not. It's an inner strength. It teaches us to listen & tells us that at times staying quiet is best!
Never think you're a bad person. Don't let Satan plant such thoughts in your head. We make mistakes almost daily. Just try to do better.
How you react when tested says a lot about you. Does the pain make you angry? Do you take it out on others? Remember pain  is part of life.
How mature you are has little to do with age. It's the strength of your soul. The more you've endured, the stronger & more mature you get.
Life will always have ups & downs, good times & bad. Learn from them all. Each new day is a new opportunity to show Him how grateful we are
Each hardship you face is designed specially for you by your Creator. It's for you to get closer to Him. He knows you can handle it.
When you're praying for someone, do so wholeheartedly. Pray for goodness & never have bad intent. Each of us needs a prayer in our favour.
Don't see the worst in others & expect them to see the best in you. Dont judge others & expect them to stand by you. Life isn't like that!
Don't feel like you have to explain your intentions to others. He knows what's in the heart. We're all answerable to Him not His creation!
Watch our tongue & what we say about others, no matter how bad the deed. Only the Almighty can decide if they're to be forgiven or punished
Almighty. No matter how busy & stressful our lives are, let us always set aside time for You, time to seek Your Mercy & Forgiveness.
When life doesn't make sense, when you're facing your darkest hour, that's when your faith is being tested to see if you crumble or hold on
Leave haters to their hating while you reach for the clouds & beyond. Don't let small-minded people bother you & hinder your progress.
If you have a good heart, you'll be hurt. That's reality. Whatever others do, they know you'll forgive. But don't keep the hurt inside you.
When others lie to you, be honest with them. When they betray your trust, stay truthful. When they're mean, be kind. Stay true to yourself!
When I took this picture today I said, "Let me not be from those who love the #Masjid but don't actually pray." #Bandaraya  #KotaKinabalu . https://t.co/WNaNPIK8Pd
We're all a work in progress. We're not perfect. As long as we're trying to be better than we were yesterday, that's what matters most.
Never underestimate what positive words can do, even from strangers. The fact that they go out of their way to say it makes it powerful!
Be wary of those who abuse you. They make a mistake & you end up apologizing. They make you doubt yourself & your worth. Let go of them.
The happiest people aren't those with no struggles. We ALL have struggles. They're the ones who endure & trust the Almighty, come what may!
The path to Paradise is not easy. We have to work hard to get there. The beauty is in the struggle. Keep going. The Almighty is watching us
If your main concern is this life, you'll often be worried & distracted. If Hereafter's your priority, He'll fill your heart with content.
Don't ever let your heart harden. Just because someone betrayed your trust, doesn't mean you can't trust others. Learn from it. You'll grow
No matter what you're addicted to : porn, drugs, alcohol, there's always hope; there's always a way back. Never give up. Never lose hope.
If something is meant for you no one can prevent it. The one you want to marry, that job, that promotion will come if it's yours. Patience!
You need to learn to say "No" at times. You don't need to be a part of everything going on around you. Life can be more peaceful that way!
Almighty. On this blessed day, guide us through all our anxiety & fears that we feel inside. Give peace to our troubled hearts & protect us
Each day we try to be better & get closer to the Almighty. It's not easy. It's a constant struggle against our desires & egos! He knows!
There will always be people who try to divide us. This is the time we need to stay strong & united. Pray for peace. Pray for humanity.
It's common to hear people say someone's going to Hell because of his bad intention. If you think like that, reflect on your own intent!
Modest dressing is for everyone not just women. Don't confuse the issue. It's a sense of shame & shyness as He expected of His creation!
Choose not to hold on to the hurt when unfair things happen in life. Let it go & forgive. Surrender to the Almighty & let Him deal with it.
Nothing happens by accident. The Almighty plans every step for us to learn life's lesson. Trust Him; keep going. You'll smile in the end!
Instead of being busy with online chats, let us keep busy with building a connection with the Almighty. This life's way too short to waste!
Know the danger signs of social media. We now have less human interaction; feel empty & trapped in virtual world! Don't get carried away!
We have all met toxic people in our lives. Their negativity slows us down. They drain our energy & add stress to our lives. Avoid them!
Don't assume anything about people. They may be going through events you may never have experienced & know nothing about. Be kind always.
Don't rejoice when bad things happen to others. Remember, it could happen to anyone of us. Pray for them to be granted ease instead.
Forgiveness is not a one-off thing. It's something you do consciously, bit by bit until you're completely healed and free from the hurt.
Humans are strange. We trust people, even those we don't know at times; yet we often doubt & are unsure about the Almighty's plans for us.
Almighty. Give me strength to say no when I'm tempted to surrender to harmful things which You forbid. Keep me on the path of goodness.
Almighty. On this blessed day, ease our hearts & let us take things in our stride. There's so much turmoil around us. Help us find peace.
Your hardship won't last. It's here today & gone tomorrow. The Almighty has promised us. Bear patience & it'll end in a beautiful way!
The Almighty didn't promise us an easy life. The road may be long & hard. Keep focus. May that last step we take be the one into Paradise!
In life, if you're good at what you do, there'll always be people who are jealous of you. Take it as a positive thing; keep doing good!
We live in a sad world. Today, we get envious over things & lifestyles people create on social media which don't even exist in real life.
When you feel heartbroken & helpless, learn to seek comfort in the words of the Almighty. Confide in Him. He'll heal you & get you back up!
We're obsessed with our appearance & we tend to neglect our soul. We try hard to look perfect but the body deteriorates. The soul lives on!
Don't let the bad you see daily make you bitter. Carry hope in your heart, kindness & generosity.  Don't let others affect you negatively.
Everyone out there is hurting in one way or the other. The fact is we will never know. Only the Almighty does. So be kind & compassionate.
Free yourself from the expectations of people & place it in the hands of your Creator. You'll see the wold from a different lens. Peace!
If you want yo be happy, learn to give. Give solely for the sake of the Almighty. There's no greater feeling than making someone's day!
Just as the Almighty opens doors for us, He also closes them. If He does that, it means there's something better waiting. Read the signs!
Losing a family member through death is probably one of the Almighty's toughest tests. But know that He has the power to relieve the grief.
You can't go back on your life. So don't look that way. Travel forward. Focus on today. What you do henceforth is what really counts!
Get back up, no matter what knocks you down each time. Endure, press on & never give up. Great blessings come with great perseverance!
Whenever you're tempted to expose someone's fault, stop & think. Imagine taking just one fault of yours & telling the whole world about it!
Begin your day with prayer, end it with prayer. Everything in between will fall into place. You'll feel a sense of calm, your heart at ease
Almighty. On this blessed Friday, help us guard our mouths & not sin with our tongues. Let our speech always be gracious with kind words.
Life goes on, with or without you. So don't worry about what others say about you. Work towards pleasing your Maker. Our days are numbered.
Be wary of the people you hang out with. Remember they can "infect" your life with their bad habits & negative thoughts. Choose wisely.
Never lose hope in His Mercy. Never believe that you're too far gone to ask for forgiveness. He knows your struggle. He created you!
Wipe someone's tears with a smile. Reach out to those needing a hand. Lend an ear to solve a problem. The Almighty loves doers of good!
If you find someone who'll look past your imperfections & befriend you for who you are, standing by you through sun & storm, treasure them.
Take things as they come. Ease your heart. Don't fret over things that are gone. Know that what's to come will be better. It's all His test
Your attitude should be the same whether someone's looking or not. Be kind at all times. Do what's right & always give from your heart.
It's natural for us to stumble, lose hope & get impatient during trials. But if we remember He's in control, we'll see the hidden blessings
Keep repenting & asking for His forgiveness. Don't let droplets of sins become rivers of regret. Be sincere & ask Him with your heart!
Don't waste time being angry about your problems. Instead, use that energy to find solutions. Pray for His guidance. He'll find a way out!
Nothing is too small or too big for the Almighty. Just ask Him. He never gets bored listening to your prayer. He loves it when you seek Him
The mind replays what the heart can't delete. So be careful what you keep in your heart. Purify it often with remembrance of your Creator.
Check yourself often & correct your faults. Quit blaming others. Take responsibility for your own life. That's the only way you can grow!
If you're getting depressed by the "perfection" you see on social media, learn to pull back. Remember that online image is NOT real life.
The world will trick you into believing its own definition of beauty. But in the end, we'll only remember the most beautiful heart & soul.
The fact is your behaviour shows your character. So if someone gossips TO you, be sure they'll also be gossiping ABOUT you behind your back
On this blessed day, we ask the Almighty to protect us from saying with our mouths what's not in our hearts. Make us among the truthful.
Why do we condemn others when we are making the same mistakes? It's hypocritical to judge people. Instead work hard to get closer to Him.
Remember Satan will keep cluttering your mind with negative thoughts as long as you're willing to give a listening ear. Don't fall for it!
Stop chasing wealth, fame & temporary things in life. You'll end up disappointed. The true source of happiness, the Almighty. Focus on Him!

If you're struggling to get back on track, don't let people mock your efforts. It's your road back to Him. He will guide you. Bear patience
Every one is facing some form of hardship. Don't believe the masks people wear to hide it. But don't despair. He knows how strong you are.
Don't let worries of the future consume you. Throw them out when they enter your mind. Ask the Almighty to give you what's best. Trust Him.
When you're positive, you show the Almighty that you're grateful. He loves that. So block out negativity that will rob you of happiness.
Keep going. The race of life is not given to the strongest person. It's for the one who says, "I won't quit because Paradise is worth it!"
We're all on a journey. No one's here to stay, no matter how much we want to, we have to go. So touch hearts, spread goodness. That's life.
If your mind is playing tricks with you today, remember: the Almighty loves you. Never give up on His Mercy. Seek Him in good & bad times!

Remember you can either complain about it or have faith in the Almighty to guide you through it, learn from it & grow. The choice is yours.
The Almighty's the only One who knows what lies in your heart. So don't feel you have to justify yourself to anyone. Only He matters!
Don't let arrogance breed in your heart. No matter how beautiful your home, king or beggar will end up in the same grave of soil in the end
The more storms you face in life, the stronger you'll be. That's how it works. So don't give up when it's darkest. Dawn will surely break.
Life will make you cry; again and again. That's just how it is. Seek comfort from the Almighty. You'll find strength to move forward again!
Almighty. On this blessed day keep our hearts from worrying about what others think of us. Keep us steadfast in doing what You want of us.
If you want the Almighty's Blessings in your life, show Him that you're firm in faith. You always seek Him. He's above everything else.
At times we feel frustrated & confused because we don't understand everything He does. That's fine. All He wants is for us to trust Him.
Don't try to win the approval of people. You'll never succeed. That's why pleasing people should never be your goal. Please your Creator.

You think you can't undo the hurt but you forget that the Almighty can do that & more. He'll make you stronger from what you've experienced
Stop asking & begging others for things which only the Almighty can give you. Seek from your Creator & Provider. You won't be disappointed.
Don't keep saying "one day" I'll repent & change my ways. Satan loves it when you delay. Make it today instead & seek His forgiveness.
The sadness, the heartbreak, the aches & pains as well as the hurt you feel are all temporary. Just like the temporary world. It won't last
When people treat you badly, stop blaming yourself for it. Remember, they're the ones with the problem. Not you. Pray for them instead.
This life is a test of patience & gratitude. It's your own individual journey back to the Almighty. Don't compare it with anyone else.
The one you despise & look down on may be the closest to the Almighty. You never know. Don't fall into the trap. Treat people respectfully.
Do you feel hollow inside? Something seems to be missing in your life though you seem to have a lot. Turn to Him & watch your life change.
When you do an act of worship only because the Almighty commanded you & not to show off or gain praise from others, that's the purest form!
Don't envy people at the top. Because the higher you climb, the harder you fall. So always be humble. It'll help you break the fall gently!
You think He's delaying everything. He knows what's going on. Don't get discouraged. Don't lose heart. Don't give up. Be persistent. Pray!
At times you feel strong & determined. Other times, you feel weak & defeated; you want to give up. Pray for strength to just keep going.
Almighty. Grant peace to the broken & the hurting. Help the millions who face injustice & inequality. Lift their situation & protect them.
Don't be too quick to assume bad things when facing a trial from the Almighty. There's good in every difficulty. Be patient. You'll see!
Be wary of greed. It keeps you wanting even more. It never seems to be enough that you'll acquire, leading to ill will, jealousy & hatred.
We take the blessing of time for granted, forgetting that time is life. Once gone, you won't get it back. Wake up before it's too late!
Work on your desires, doubts & arrogance - the root of diseases of the heart. Cleanse it till it's able to "see" what's good, pure & true!
Don't be over confident. A true believer is always working hard to do more to please His Maker. Always be humble & have hope in His Mercy.
Don't forget the Almighty created us for His Mercy. He can erase your past, your regrets & free you from the wrong you've done. Ask Him.
A few clicks on Google don't make you knowledgeable & give you the right to preach to others. Learn from those who know & read widely.
Respect your parents at all times, even if you don't agree with them. Keep your ego out of the picture and interact with them sincerely!
Keep going despite the odds & what people say. Work hard, Honour the Almighty in the best way. He will turn the hearts of those against you
Look around for things that the Almighty has blessed you with. Grateful people are happy people. They're less stressed. He'll give you more
Don't see your illness as a cause of despair. Use it as a means to turn to Him for Mercy & healing. Almighty, grant the sick complete cure.
Life comes with both happiness & sadness. Learn to be patient when sad & grateful when happy. He will reward you & elevate your status.
Keep your modesty in check for both women & men. The most beautiful are those who don't need validation from people as well as social media
When you feel lost, instead of drifting further, remind yourself this life is temporary. The feeling won't last. Ask the Almighty for ease.
You started out wrong. You're ashamed of your past. Don't dwell on self pity. Take charge if you want sincere change. He will guide you.
If your friends are stopping you from getting close to the Almighty, they're not for you. Real friends want the best of both worlds for you
Learn to give more than you take. Be humble. At the end of the day, tread the earth lightly. Remember, we are nothing without His Mercy!
Beware those who gossip about others. They point out flaws in people to make them feel good about themselves. They'll only end up miserable
Beware the liar. He lies so much that he forgets the truth. He even finds it hard to accept the truth & ends up believing in his own lies.
Learn to breathe & smile more. Every challenge you're facing will have a solution. He'll see to that. Do your part & He'll do the rest!
We get upset when we expect more from others; because we'd be willing to go that extra mile for them. But know that everyone is different.
It's sad to see people who promise so many things but deep down they have no intention of fulfilling it. It's hypocrisy. May He guide us!
The hurt will heal, hatred will turn to love. Everything will pass. So bear patience. Don't worry. The Almighty has told us nothing lasts.
Don't just be impressed with what's on the outside in people. Look deeper. Look for integrity & sincerity; things that matter in the end.
Social media is scary. It makes you think you need to be perfect. So we hide our flaws, pretending it's all good. Don't fall into this trap
Keep you heart calm. Attach it to your Creator. Ignore all the noise. The day you walk in Paradise is when every hardship will make sense.
Despite all that's going on, don't let hatred harden you. Think of Him, His blessings & the less fortunate. That should soften your heart.
Stop being impressed by wealth & status. Instead, be impressed by those who treat other human beings well, in both good times & bad.
As life gets more hectic, you feel something isn't right with your life. You're restless & uneasy. Turn to your Creator for the remedy!
Almighty. Grant us strength & endurance to go through the tough tests right now. No matter what's happening, fill our hearts with hope.
Beware the trick of Satan. He will fill you with so much negativity  that you will begin to believe him & give in. Seek the Almighty's help
You may feel shattered to a million pieces & there's no hope but rely on the Almighty's plans for you. Don't insult Him. He can fix you.
Things change all the time. Nothing lasts. So don't wait for an apology, forgive. Give what you can. Spread the joy. Make things happen.
If you're showing off your whole life on social media so openly, be prepared for the bad that will come with it: envy, greed, the evil eye!
Be a positive influence to people you meet. Tell your loved ones you love them. Forgive those who hurt you. It's easier on your heart!
You're so broken. You can't find the right words to talk to Him. Your tears will do the job. Tears are words your heart can't express.
Love will always trump hate. The Almighty will see to that. Don't worry. Things may not make sense now but trust Him as His plans unfold.
If you only knew the rewards of forgiving others, you'd do it readily. Forgive & He will forgive you. He will reward you. He will love you!
Don't let hatred grow in you, otherwise everything in your life will be affected. It will distract & anger you. It will often end in regret
The Almighty made you the way you are for a purpose. It wasn't by accident. He'll never neglect you. You'll never be left out. Thank Him!
We want to be connected all the time. The minute we lose it, we get anxious, even angry. What about the vital connection with our Creator?
Keep your good deeds between you & the Almighty. Don't show them off in public to win praise. He knows what lies in your heart. Purify it!
Almighty. Protect those being targetted because of who they are. Grant ease to those separated from families & loved ones. Keep them safe.
You keep asking but it doesn't happen. You're wondering if He hears you. Don't expect things to happen according to your time. Trust Him.
Times are difficult now. Uncertainties abound. Hate is spreading like wildfire. Don't quit. Patience & prayer are the solutions we need.
Have you ever lost hope that your life could ever change? Instead of being shaken by the empty promises of the world, turn to Him in prayer
Almighty. Get rid of the fear & worry from our hearts. Give us peace, not the one the world offers but the true peace that comes from You.
Patience is when you're able to conquer that angry voice in your head which wants to take revenge on others who hurt you or are mean to you
We're always in such a hurry to give up when things are bad. Be patient. Trust. When you least expect it, something great will come along!
Beware the tongue. Though it has no bones, the damage it inflicts can bring you to the depths of despair. Use it to speak good, kind words.
We all want happiness. So give thanks when blessed. Be patient in trials. Repent & seek forgiveness when sinful. Watch your life change.
Good or bad, what we do in our lives will come back to us at some stage. So if you want goodness, stop making life difficult for others.

Sometimes when you're insulted, you have no other option but to remain silent. Let the Almighty deal with it. Preserving the peace is best..
Don't be in a rush because the Almighty's plan is always perfect. There's a lesson every step of the way. Know that He's testing our faith!
Your life may not be too good but a friend seems to be having it all. Don't let this make you jealous. Be mature enough to be happy for him.
Stop jumping to conclusions. Always assume the best. We're all on the same journey called life but our approaches are different. Be kind!
No matter how many trials & difficulties You test us with, don't let us lose hope & turn away from You. Make this a means for our Paradise!
Everyone is a sinner but not everyone asks for forgiveness. So do it constantly. Forgiveness is a powerful way to bring you back to Him.
Don't let your trials overwhelm you. Many have gone through & survived what you're facing. You're not alone. He is with you all the way!
Happiness is not from status or wealth. It's from your faith which lies in your heart. No one has the power over it except the Almighty.
If you feel you can't get out of bed to face a new day because of the trials in life, ask the Almighty to lift you & grant you strength.
If you claim to love the Almighty, show patience always. Don't be among those when tested with hardship, they complain & become impatient.
When you're good at what you do, people will criticize & ridicule you. They might even spread lies & rumours. Keep going. He's All-Knowing.
Learn to be happy & wish happiness for others. Don't be jealous when others have more than you. Be grateful & He will grant you more.
Almighty. Grant us a huge dose of hope. There's so much pain in the world that it's easy to feel helpless. Guide & protect us all the way.
As you begin to trust the Almighty more & more, you'll have confidence, hope & a heart filled with peace like never before. Blessed!
Everyone deals with pain differently, rightly so. The next time you feel like judging someone, don't. Understand their struggle instead.
Don't shy away from telling your family that you love them. Kind words can go a long way towards forming strong, healthy relationships.
No place is safe! Heartbreaking to hear that the largest hospital in #Aleppo bombed. May He protect the people of #Syria & around the world.
Praise your child’s good behavior & character often. Help them realize how good it feels inside to do good deeds or be generous with others!
Beware the ones who appear 'religious' but still backbite, & gossip freely. Don't get involved with them. Spread love & compassion instead.
Almighty. On this blessed day, we pray You ease our hardship, heal our aches & pains, grant us  patience to bear what's in store for us.
Weakness, mistakes & failures don't last if you're determined to trust Him & keep going. The Almighty promises us ease after hardship.
You don't need to comment about everything that goes on around you. You can choose to remain silent and let the Almighty take over.
We may not have similar views on things. That's alright. We don't have to agree with every choice a person makes but say it respectfully.
Never mind if people are obsessed with the latest designer wear. Remember the most beautiful heart could lay beneath tattered clothes!
Be mindful of images you share & post on social media. These may well outlive you. What kind of footprint do you want to leave behind?
Sad is the world today where trust has become a big issue. Whatever is said to someone in confidence cannot be regarded as safe anymore.
If you feel that Satan defeated you yesterday, do your utmost to defeat him today. Do more good deeds, repent & get close to the Almighty.
How beautiful it is to do good without expecting anything. Imagine those you've helped praying & asking Him for your well being. Keep going.
Keep to your word & be good to people but don't expect the same treatment. Understand this & you won't end up with unnecessary troubles.
Don't spread rumours & don't listen to them. If you're in the company of those doing such things, refuse to take part & don't believe them.
Life's sacred. It's not for us to do as we please. Resorting to bombing & killing has never resolved disputes. It only snuffs out lives. https://t.co/6yFMS6kE70
Review your life, refocus & check that you're on track. Let go of distractions. Pray that the Almighty guides you every  step of the way.
Almighty. On this blessed day guide us so that no matter what comes our way, we're able to say, "It's Your Decree". You know what we don't!
Don't go through life with negative thoughts in your mind. Empty out the negative. Make room for the positive. See the difference it makes.
Unfair things may have happened to you & caused a lot of pain. But remember the Almighty is making you a lot stronger in the process.
Don't get frustrated by your trials and hardship. Surely you can't expect life to be one smooth road. It doesn't work that way. Be patient.
Don't waste time with those who pull you down each time you're trying to get up. Seek your strength from the Almighty. He's All-Knowing.
If you want to know the true state of a person's heart, look at how he treats the rich & the poor. That in itself speaks volumes!
You're not a failure if you make mistakes. We all do. It's part of life. But the ones who learn from them & strive to do better are winners!
The sad truth is you can give people the best you have & it won't be enough. That's ok. Do your best anyway. Do it to please your Creator.
Almighty. Protect us from all evil, the scorching heat of the day & the storms of life. Help us when we stumble & catch us when we fall.
Whatever you do, don't show off. Make your intention clear. Keep it between you & the Almighty. Any arrogance can make it all meaningless.
Almighty. We pray You keep us strong even when we feel weak. Keep us brave even when we're scared. Keep us humble even when we have much.
Be wary of joking excessively, mocking people & hurting their feelings in the process. This leads to grudges, hatred & destructive feelings.
When the Almighty sends you a trial, He has the solution to it too. Don't waste time getting help from others. Seek Him for a way out!
When you ask the Almighty for something, ask with all your heart. Don't ask half-heatedly. You must trust that He'll grant you what's best!
May the Almighty bless your days with happiness, contentment, love and peace. May you spread kindness wherever you go. Aameen #EidulAdha
The sacrifice on #Eid is not mere slaughter but to show gratitude to the Almighty for His blessings & a means to feed the less fortunate.
Have a blessed #EidulAdha. #HariRaya #HariRayaQurban #Qurbani. https://t.co/Fc9osX1KSt
Have a blessed #EidulAdha. I wish you a beautiful holiday with your loved ones. May the Almighty accept our sacrifice & answer our prayers.
Almighty. Make this blessed #DayofArafah a day of renewal of faith in our hearts & deeds. A day of repentance & a day to get closer to You.
Make the most of today, #DayofArafah. You'll never know which deed is going to please the Almighty so much that He'll grant you Mercy.
Almighty. As pilgrims gather in #Arafah on this Great Day of #Hajj, we pray that You grant them ease & accept their acts of worship. Aameen.
Almighty. Safeguard those who are on #Hajj, answer their prayers and bring them back to their loved ones safely. Aameen
The Almighty loves those who show real patience. They don't give up. They don't feel hopeless. They struggle & strive; all for His sake.
Seek His forgiveness often. For past sins, for those you've forgotten or overlooked. Ask the Almighty sincerely not to punish you for it.
Almighty. On this blessed Friday we ask You to grant those who haven't been on the #Hajj pilgrimage, the opportunity to do so soon. Aameen.
Don't lust after power & worldly titles. They don't matter. You can be an iconic figure but you're just another name to the Angel of Death.
A mother's love & favours are priceless. The truth is whatever we do will never be equal to the sacrifice & compassion mothers have shown.
Constantly praise the Almighty even when you're stressed, sad, confused or broken. He will then raise you & no one can bring you down!
If you want to criticize, choose your words carefully. Don't be mean. Don't make personal remarks. Use kind & gentle words. Do it privately.
Don't begrudge the neighbour who has more, the friend who's more beautiful. The Almighty blesses us differently so use the blessings wisely.
Almighty. Give me patience when things don't go my way. Help me find it in my heart to accept what You will & that You're the Best Planner.
Today, we've become more selfish. It's often about us. Learn to extend a helping hand, bring someone else up. Be caring. Be compassionate.
Don't think that suffering weakens you. It doesn't. It shows the depth of life He has created. So when pain drags you down, He's there!
The best part of your life is not lived loudly on a world stage for all to see. It's the small acts of kindness which nobody knows about.
Beware those who are never satisfied. They allow Satan to keep reminding them of what is missing. No peace in their heart.
Your heart may be broken to a million pieces by this world, but if you trust your Maker, He has a way of mending it, making it whole again!
Don't complain & grumble while you wait for what you want. Have good patience. If the Almighty wants you to have it, He'll give it to you!
You may be the healthiest person physically but if you have jealousy in your heart, you're sick. You're always sick till you get rid of it!
As we enter the blessed ten days, make each of them count. Maximise good deeds & acts of charity. Work hard to get close to the Almighty.
Stay away from those who are always bragging about their success & who they are. True success speaks for itself. No shouting is needed!
Almighty. Grant ease to those in pain. Give them the highest level of patience & strength & a way out of their present situation. Aameen.
At times you may feel like you're stuck & not getting anywhere.  Remember in life, you may have to move backward in order to move forward!
One day you'll look back on your life & thank the Almighty for every little thing that has brought you where you've always wanted to be!
We live in an era where we devote so much time to useless matters. Don't let the distractions take over your life & mess up your priorities.
When you're trying your best, that's what matters. It may not be good enough for some, but that's ok. The Almighty knows & will guide you.
The right path is not the easiest one. You'll be knocked down many times over. But it doesn't mean you crumble. Press on for Paradise!
We all have negative thoughts sometimes. It shows we're human. But when your outlook is positive, you don't let such thoughts control you!
Be wary of your desires. Don't let it get out of control. Remind yourself of what you want in the end. Paradise is worth all the sacrifice!
Treat each day as a new lease of life. Don't waste it. Not everyone gets it. Ask Him to forgive your shortcomings & be a better person.
Whatever's happening now is for the best. You have to believe that. You might not understand it, but if you trust Him, you'll be rewarded.
Never mind if others look down on you or spread rumours about you. You can't control wagging tongues. Focus on pleasing The One who matters.
We expect too much from others. Don't. We'll end up disappointed. Don't depend on people. We need to learn this. Depend on the Almighty.
There's so much bad out there. Don't add to it. Be kind instead. It costs nothing. But it could mean everything to the ones you touched.
When He makes you wait, you think He doesn't love you. When He takes away what you love, you think He's punishing you. Trust His wisdom.
Guard your heart & don't let it get too attached to this world. We are mere travellers. Nothing lasts, including people's memory of us.
Don't go round putting others down. Stop that burning desire to make yourself feel superior. Strive to encourage people. We all need that!
Some people thrive on arguing. They do it even over small & petty things. Refuse to be drawn into such arguments. Life's better than that!
Be humble & share knowledge instead of looking down on those who seem to know less. Today, many love to show off whatever little they know.
Don't feel defeated when you fail. It's easy to just give up & say you can't do it. Pick yourself up & press on. The Almighty is with you.
Let go of grudges & don't make enemies out of others. Try to live peacefully without hatred & envy. Life will be less stressful & happier.
Who knows the pain & tears a smile can hide except the Almighty. What is shown to the world is just a glimpse. Spill your sorrows to Him.
You may ask Him for everything you desire in this world but never forget to ask for the best for your Hereafter. That's what we REALLY need!
Whatever the dilemma, there's a cure. Whatever the difficulty, there's a solution. That's the Almighty's Promise. He never fails. Stay firm.
Almighty. Give me hope when I despair. Pick me up when I fall. Put my pieces back together when I'm broken. Protect me always. Aameen.
The reality is you'll never know which step you take will bring about what you've been looking for. Keep walking. Life has unexpected turns.
When someone trusts you & confides in you, honour it. Don't betray it. Once trust is broken. it'll be hard to pick up the pieces.
Some 70,000 thoughts fill our heads daily. Both good & bad. You need to choose. Anger, hatred, jealousy or positive & peaceful. Be careful!

Hardship is actually a gift from the Almighty. If you endure & stay firm, no matter how difficult, He'll reward you & elevate your status.
How we interact with others can be among our biggest trials. Purify the heart from hypocrisy, pride & mischievous acts. May He guide us!
Don't leave someone with harsh, unkind words ringing in their ears. Make peace & move on. You don't want this to haunt you on Judgement Day!
Almighty. On this blessed day, help us hold on to hope when facing trials. Give us courage to go on when we feel the world closing in on us.
